category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Skip_is_required_check_for_revise_and_save_as
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the check for mandatory fields during Revise and Save-As operation has to be skipped or not. Valid values are 0/1. 0 - Do not skip the check during Revise and Save-As operations. 1 - Skip the check during Revise and Save-As operations.
